attributes.action: Right to bear firearms, police to be armed, and ability to defend members of the community in trouble.
attributes.additional_details:
All responsible adults should have the right to carry(exposed to view) firearms in public.
All children 14-under 18 are allowed to have firearm practice under parental or proffesional supervision and on a private range.
All members of the public to come in possession of a firearm to be given a weapon safety breif by shop owners.
Hunting/self defence stores to open to generate new business opportunities and allow the public to purchase firearms, if they are 18 and older, and aslong as their criminal record is clear and with good reason(defense of home and others)
If a man/woman intends to do harm to an innocent member of the public, civilians must be allowed to interfere and defend fellow civilians.
All police officers to carry an exposed or concealed firearm to defend themselves and prevent incidents before the have a chance to escalate.
